- Excerpt from Expansion of Scope of Small Low-Profit Enterprises For Preferential Income Tax Treatment: 
The State Administration of Taxation released the Public Notice [2015] No. 17 (Notice 17) on 18 March 2015 to further expand the scope of small low-profit enterprises for the entitlement of the Enterprise Income Tax (EIT) benefits. Specifically, qualified small low-profit enterprises are subject to EIT benefits including a reduction of EIT rate from the standard rate of 25% to 20%, and a half reduction of the taxable income.
